content:
This wiki page seems to be a bit incomplete/outdated:
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Tooling_Ecosystem
For example, latest Forge releases (21.0) for both STU3 and R4 now support authoring OperationDefinition and SearchParameter resources. Also download links seem to be missing.
Could we update this page?
Forge does search parameter and operation definition editing? Awesome!
Yup, we have added support in both STU3 and R4 releases. We may add support for other definitional resources, based on customer demand.
